column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " There it is , guys , The Great Divide . "
#Text=Katara says : " Wow , I could just stare at it forever . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Okay , I 've seen enough . "
#Text=Katara says : " How can you not be fascinated Sokka ?
#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " If you 're looking for the canyon guide , I was here first !
#Text=" Katara says : " Ooh , canyon guide ?
#Text=Sounds informative .

#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " Believe me , he 's more than a tour guide , he 's an earthbender , and the only way in and out of the canyon is with his help , and he 's taking my tribe across next .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Calm down , we know you 're next .
#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " You would n't be so calm if the Fire Nation destroyed your home and forced you to flee !
#Text=My whole tribe has to walk thousands of miles to the capital city of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're a refugee !
#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " Huh , tell me something I do n't know .
#Text=" Katara says : " Is that your tribe ?
#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " It most certainly is not !
#Text=That 's the Zhang tribe , a bunch of low - life thieves .
#Text=They 've been the enemies of my tribe for a hundred years .
#Text=Hey , Zhangs !
#Text=I 'm saving a spot for my tribe so do n't even think about stealing it !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Where are the rest of the Gan Jin ?
#Text=Still tidying up their camp site ?
#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " Yes , but they sent me ahead of them to hold a spot .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " I did n't know the canyon guide took reservations .
#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " Ha , of course you did n't !
#Text=That 's the ignorance I 'd expect from a messy Zhang .
#Text=So unorganized and ill - prepared for a journey .
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " Sorry about the wait , youngsters .
#Text=Who 's ready to cross this here canyon ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Uh , one of them , I think .
#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " I was here first , my party 's on their way .
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " I ca n't guide people who are n't here .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Guess you guys will have to make the trip tomorrow .
#Text=" Gan Jin tribesman says : " Wait , here they come !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " You 're not seriously gon na cave into these spoiled Gan Jins ?
#Text=I mean we 're refugees too !
#Text=And we 've got sick people that need shelter .
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " I ... uh ... well ... " Gan Jin tribesman says : " We 've got old people who are weary from traveling .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Sick people get priority over old people .
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Maybe you Zhangs would n't have so many sick people if you were n't such slobs .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " If you Gan Jins were n't so clean , you would n't live to be so old .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well Aang , ready to put your peace - making skills to the test ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know , a fight over chores is one thing , but these people have been feuding for a hundred years .
#Text=" Katara says : " Everybody listen up !
#Text=This is the Avatar , and if you give him a chance , I 'm sure he can come up with a compromise that will make everyone happy .
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh , you could share the earthbender and travel together ?
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Absolutely not !
#Text=We 'd rather be taken by the Fire Nation than travel with those stinking thieves !
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " We would n't travel with those pompous fools anyway !
#Text=" Aang says : " All right here 's the deal , you 're all going down together and Appa here will fly your sick and elderly across !
#Text=Does that seem fair ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Sorry , Appa , you 'll have to do this on your own .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , this feuding tribe stuff is serious business .
#Text=Are you sure it 's a good idea getting involved in this ?
#Text=" Aang says : " To tell you the truth , I 'm not sure .
#Text=But when have I ever been ?
#Text=" Katara says : " He 's the Avatar , Sokka , making peace between people is his job .
#Text=" Sokka says : " His job 's gon na make us cross this whole canyon on foot is n't it ?
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " Okay , now comes the bad news .
#Text=No food allowed in the canyon , it attracts dangerous predators .
#Text=" Gan Jin Leader says : " No food ?!
#Text=This is ridiculous .
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " Oh , you babies can go a day without food ?
#Text=Would you rather be hungry , or dead ?
#Text=Now , we 're heading down in ten minutes .
#Text=All food better be in your gut or in the garbage !
#Text=" Aang says : " Appa 's going to take good care of you 'till we get there .
#Text=See you on the other side , buddy !
#Text=Yip yip !
#Text=" Aang says : " Nice bending !
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " The job 's much more than bending , kid .
#Text=Folks want information .
#Text=Many of you are probably wondering how canyons are formed .
#Text=Experts tell us this canyon was most likely carved into the ground by earth spirits who were angry at local farmers for not offering them a proper sacrifice .
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " He he he , guess the spirits are still angry !
#Text=Hope you all brought sacrifices .
#Text="
